content:
/>
IX.iii.1.l.1
.m
.
Campaign Contributions
Count campaign contributions only if the beneficiary has access to the money and could use it for purposes other than their political campaign.
If the laws restrict the use of contributions to campaign purposes, then the contributions would not be considered as income to the beneficiary.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I - Counting Specific Types of Income
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I
